reviewText: Teaching good tools in life to your children, Berenstain Bears will help.
I've read this to my grandson many times.  The video made the book come alive.  Reinforces good values to children .
My 4 year old daughter loves these movies and the books. They always have a great message...especially "Count Your Blessings."

I was a huge BB fan when I was in elementary school. I had pretty much every single Berenstein Bear book and VHS tape produced up until about 1996. I have to agree with some reviewers that I preferred the voices in the old tapes to these new ones, but it's just matter of what you're used to. That being said, my 4 and 5 year old boys love the new version, and I love the morals/values they pick up from each episode.
Im happy to be able to share my childhood cartoons with my daughter I happy that there multiple shows on 1 disc

My 2-year old loves the Berenstain Bears, and we have several of the DVD's. This is another good one- six episodes (the "newer" ones, not the original 80's version), all cute with good moral lessons. Highly recommend!
Any Berenstain Bears DVD is a treat for my children.  They love them.  And we love the DVDs too.  They always have a good lesson and are very "clean" and appropriate for little ones.
